price: Dan Dia mewariskan kepada kamu tanah-tanah, rumah-rumah, dan harta benda mereka, dan (begitu pula) tanah yang belum kamu injak 1212.  Dan adalah Allah Maha Kuasa terhadap segala sesuatu.
arabic: وَأَوۡرَثَكُمۡ أَرۡضَهُمۡ وَدِيَٰرَهُمۡ وَأَمۡوَٰلَهُمۡ وَأَرۡضٗا لَّمۡ تَطَـُٔوهَاۚ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ قَدِيرٗا
footnotes: 1212.  "Tanah yang belum diinjak" ialah tanah-tanah yang akan dimasuki oleh tentara Islam.

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-awrathakum arḍahum wadiyārahum wa-amwālahum wa-arḍan lam taṭaūhā wakāna al-lahu ʿalā kulli shayin qadīran
translations: And He caused you to inherit
